Html:
I see Create270Test in the x12.Test.Unit project.

Is there a way to create 270 requests more 'generically'?
How do I know if this conforms to 5010 270?

I'm new to x12 and HIPPA calls, so what's the best way to create requests?

Do I need to create my own XSLT to transform XML from the WPC HIPPA wsd's?

If I create a class from the WPC 270_A1.xsd - can I use that with the Parser to create the X12 270 request?

So many questions - basically - what's the best way to start using this?
